channel.title: Tutorial on My Awesome Site
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial on My Awesome Site

item.title: FFmpeg - Convert Any Video Format to MP4
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: If you have ffmpeg installed on your Linux machine, then it actually could help you to convert any video format to MP4!

item.title: Ngrok - Make Your localhost Accessible Publicly
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: ngrok is a globally distributed reverse proxy that secures, protects and accelerates your applications and network services, no matter where you run them.

item.title: Mystiq - FFmpeg's GUI
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: Do you know FFmpeg? This is the GUI version of it. (If you don’t like FFmpeg CLI version, this is the your right choice!)

item.title: Eternalblue (MS17-010) - SMBv1's Exploit
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: EternalBlue is a computer exploit software developed by the U.S. National Security Agency (NSA). It is based on a vulnerability in Microsoft Windows that allowed users to gain access to any number of computers connected to a network.

item.title: Virustotal - A Virus Scanning Website.
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: Analyse suspicious files, domains, IPs and URLs to detect malware and other breaches, automatically share them with the security community.

item.title: Recordmydesktop - Screen Recorder based on CLI
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: A simple command line tool that performs the basic tasks of capturing and encoding.

item.title: Private File Sharing with Onionshare
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: OnionShare is an open-source tool that lets you securely and anonymously share files, host websites, and chat with friends using the Tor network.

item.title: Getting (free) e-books via Bot Telegram
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: Get ‘free’ e-book(s) easily via Telegram bot.

item.title: FFmpeg - Convert MP4 to GIF
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: My simple note in regards of converting video (MP4) to GIF.

item.title: Screen Recorder with FFmpeg
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: My simple note in regards of screen recording using ffmpeg.
